column5:
Hi, 

My name is Nathalie and I'm interested in you 7 day yoga retreat.

I found you through this site:
https://www.bookyogaretreats.com/maui-wellness-center/7-days-maui-wellness-yoga-retreat-in-hawaii

Do you have 7 day yoga retreats all year round? Or is it only on selected dates? 

I'm interested in coming to Hawaii and practice yoga in a calm environment. Currently I'm thinking February 20th-27th. Do you have availability then? 

If you don't have retreats those dates, is it possible to attend daily yoga on a drop-in basis? 

Many thanks!
Best Regards,
Nathalie
